q: returns from visit with Gabrielle Giffords Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand ( D-N.Y.) returned Monday from Houston, where she visited with Rep. Gabrielle Giffords ( D-Ariz.), who is recovering from a gunshot wound to the head. Returned fr Houston today. Gabrielle Giffords continues to defy the odds& is so appreciative of all your support. Pls cont to keep her in your prayers, Kirsten Gillibrand posted on her Twitter account. Gabrielle Giffords was shot in the head at close range during a public event in Tucson, Ariz., on Jan. 8. Michael Vick Isn't Hosting Super Bowl Party Associated Press- Eagles quarterback Michael Vick has told NFL commissioner Roger Goodell that he's not hosting a Super Bowl party this weekend. He has said that on numerous occasions people have been using his name about being involved in some type of a party and he had no intention of participating in that, Roger Goodell said. The commissioner said he's spoken with Michael Vick three times in the last two weeks about his plans.
